report.title: Simple Location List 3
report.description: Alternative grid report used by the Dynamic Location Form to retrieve the locations associated with a survey and user.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms lt on lt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = l.id and lw.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional co on ST_INTERSECTS(co.public_geom, COALESCE(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom)) and co.website_id=lw.website_id #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND lw.website_id = '#website_id#' AND l.created_by_id=#iUserID#

param.name: website_id
param.description: Select the website to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM websites

param.name: iUserID
param.description: Something has gone wrong as you are logged in to the system but do not have an ID
